menu.name: Visuals
menu.desc: Options for visual effects in the mod.

checkbox.desc: If disabled, stuff like screen flashes will not happen.

choice.name: Stickers
choice.desc: Change how stickers on the loading screen are picked.

menu.name: Gameplay
menu.desc: Options that affect gameplay in the mod.

checkbox.name: Death Lines
checkbox.desc: If the death lines are annoying to you, you can disable them here.

menu.name: Logging
menu.desc: Options for logging information in the console. Useful for debugging.

checkbox.name: Sprite Logging
checkbox.desc: Logs information about sprites added via code.

checkbox.name: Misc. Logging
checkbox.desc: Logs some miscellaneous information about the mod. WARNING: These will likely spam your console! Use at your own risk!
